Gain bonuses for starring Punk champions.

name: Party Starters

desc: The damage over time effect from your Dazzlers lasts @duration@ seconds longer and deals @damageamp@% more damage. Gain a Nami and a Bard.
name: The Ol' Razzle Dazzle

desc: @Delay@ seconds into combat, all enemies and non-KDA units are stunned and forced to dance for @StunDuration@ seconds. Your KDA champions gain @BonusAP@ Ability Power. Gain a Lillia and a Kai'Sa.
name: Mesmerizing Performance

desc: After their first sampled cast, EDM champions will sample @newfrequency*100@% more frequently. Gain a Lux.
name: The Drop

desc: Edgelords' attacks deal @cleave*10@% of their damage to enemies within @HexRange@ hexes of their target. Gain a Yasuo and a Kayle.
name: Live for Danger

desc:
Gain a Bard. Combat start: Jazz champions gain permanent bonuses based on the number of active traits.
@firstBreakpoint@: @Health@ max Health
@secondBreakpoint@: and @AS@% Attack Speed
@thirdBreakpoint@: and @ad@% Attack Damage and @ap@ Ability Power
name: That's Jazz, Baby!

desc: Crowd Divers gain @Stats@ Armor, @Stats@ Magic Resist, @Stats@ Ability Power, @Stats@% Attack Damage and @Stats@% Attack Speed for each adjacent enemy. Gain an Evelynn and a Katarina.

desc: Every @BonusAttackThreshold@ attacks, Big Shots also fire a bomb that deals @ADPercent*100@% Attack Damage to enemies within 1 hex of the target. Gain a Kai'Sa.
name: Bigger Shot

desc: Allies of your Emo champions gain @percenteffect*100@% of the Emo Mana bonus when any ally dies. Gain an Annie and a Vex.
name: Emotional Connection

desc:
Your 8-Bit champions execute targets below @ExecuteThreshold*100@% Health. Executions have a @BaseDropChance@% chance to drop @Gold@ gold, increased by @LevelScalar@% for each high score achieved. Gain a Corki and a Garen.

Current drop chance: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT10_Augment_InsertCoin_GoldChance@%

desc: The first time your Headliner dies, they become invulnerable and heal @Heal*100@% of their max Health over @repairtime@ seconds instead.
name: Encore!

desc:
Damage from Executioners' attacks and spells Shred and Sunder enemies by @ShredSunder@% for @Duration@ seconds. Gain a Twitch.

(Shred: reduce Magic Resist, Sunder: reduce Armor)

desc: Your units that start combat in a lighted hex gain a @HealthShieldPercent*100@% max Health shield for @Duration@ seconds. Gain a Kai'Sa and Lillia.

desc: Keep @percent*100@% of the Heartsteel hearts you convert into rewards. Your Heartsteel champions gain @Health@ Health. Gain a K'Sante and an Aphelios.

desc: Your Headliner's damage heals your Superfans for @HealPercent*100@% of the damage dealt. Gain a Gnar.

desc: Enemies that attack a Guardian's shield take magic damage equal to @HealthPercent@% of the shielded unit's max Health (up to once per second). Gain a Pantheon.

desc: Allies sharing a trait with your Headliner gain @health@ Health and @as@% Attack Speed.

desc: Enemies your Edgelords dash through become Mana-Reaved, Chilled, and Wounded for @duration@ seconds. Gain a Yasuo and a Kayle.

desc: Rapidfire champions start combat with @StartingStacks@ stacks of Attack Speed from their trait, and can now go up to @NewMaxStacks@ stacks. Gain a Jinx and a Senna.

desc: EDM's sampled champion gains @mana@ Mana every @interval@ seconds. When they cast, they gain @ap@% Attack Damage and @ap@ Ability Power for the rest of combat. Gain a Jax and a Lux.

desc: When your Spellweavers cast their 2nd Ability each combat, they instantly cast it again at @DamagePercent*100@% effectiveness. Gain a Gragas and a Seraphine.

desc: Country champions have a @GoldChance@% chance to drop @BonusKillGold@ gold on kill. Your Dreadsteed's chances are doubled. Gain a Samira.

desc: Create a clone of your Headliner with @MinBonusTOOLTIPONLY*100@% -@MaxBonusTOOLTIPONLY*100@% of their base health (based on stage level). You cannot equip items on the clone.

desc: Your True Damage champions gain @health@ Health and @attackspeed*100@% Attack Speed for each item they are holding. Gain a Yasuo and a Senna.
